caption.p: A social network graph illustrating the connections among countries and regional networks in CORDS (CORDS=Connecting Organizations for Regional Disease Surveillance; MBDS=Mekong Basin Disease Surveillance network; EAIDSNet=East Africa Integrated Disease Surveillance Network; SEEHN=Southeastern European (SEE) Health Network; MECIDS=Middle East Consortium for Infectious Disease Surveillance; APEIR=Asia Partnership on Emerging Infectious Diseases Research; SACIDS=Southern African Centre for Infectious Disease Surveillance). Source: Katherine C. Bond.
